title: If You're Bored, That's Your Problem w/ Lennon Parham
description:
Crack open your shorty Cokes and get your French Twists ready, because this week we are getting #authentic with Lennon Parham (VEEP, Bless This Mess). Hair up or hair down, navigating the darkness, muscling in, and discovering how deep we can go (oh, really deep) in this Scorpio heavy episode.

Special thanks to Lemon Parsnips for this week's outro song.

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod
June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram
Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram
Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (June Diane Rapheal, Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair)
